topic.name: /say
topic.text: Talk to the people in your immediate vicinity.

topic.name: /shout
topic.text: Talk to people in your sector.

topic.name: /tell
topic.text: Talk to someone privately.

topic.name: /guild
topic.text: Talk to everyone in your guild privately.

topic.name: /group
topic.text: Talk to your group privately.

topic.name: /me
topic.text: Perform an action see by people in your vicinity.

topic.name: /auction
topic.text: Put an item up for sale or offer to buy something.

topic.name: /report
topic.text: Makes the server log what target player is saying.

topic.name: /who
topic.text: <filtr> Vypise online hrace vyhovujici filtru.

topic.name: /buddy
topic.text: <jmeno> Prida hrace mezi tve pratele.

topic.name: /notbuddy
topic.text: <jmeno> Vyhodi hrace ze seznamu tvych pratel.

topic.name: /buddylist
topic.text: Vypise seznam tvych pratel.

topic.name: /online
topic.text: Vypise seznam tvych pratel, kteri jsou v soucasnosti online.

topic.name: /roll
topic.text: <#> <strany> Rolls a certain number of dice with the specified sides and gives the answer._czech.

topic.name: /rollstat
topic.text: <attribute> Tells you whether your stat was good enough to apply in a situation._czech.

topic.name: /rollskill
topic.text: <skill> Tells you whether your skill was successful._czech.

topic.name: /pos
topic.text: Napis tvou soucasnou pozici v sektoru. (Debugging purposes only.)

topic.name: /spawn
topic.text: Presune te zpet na pozici, ze ktere jsi zacinal. (Debug purposes only.)

topic.name: /attack
topic.text: <#> Zautoci na zamerenou postavu se stupnem agrese 1-5.

topic.name: /stopattack
topic.text: Prestane utocit.

topic.name: /admin
topic.text: Admin Console.

topic.name: /greet
topic.text: Zamava tvym pratelum.

topic.name: /stoptrading
topic.text: Zakaz aby s tebou kdokoliv zkousel obchodovat.

topic.name: /starttrading
topic.text: You are ready to trade.

topic.name: /buy
topic.text: Nakup od obchodnika.

topic.name: /sell
topic.text: Prodej obchodnikovi.

topic.name: /trade
topic.text: Zacni obchodovat se zamerenym hracem.

topic.name: /give
topic.text: Predej predmety zamerenemu NPC.

topic.name: /assist
topic.text: [hrac] Zamer se na cil, ktery ma zamereny tvuj cil, nebo ... ????????.

topic.name: /ignore
topic.text: Shows ignore window.

topic.name: /add_ignore
topic.text: [hrac] Zacne ignorovat jakekoliv pokusy o komunikaci ze strany zadaneho hrace.

topic.name: /remove_ignore
topic.text: [player] Remove target player from ignore list.

topic.name: /cast
topic.text: <kouzlo> Zacni kouzlit.

topic.name: /away
topic.text: <zprava> Nastavi automatickou odpoved ('off' to zase vypne.

topic.name: /loot
topic.text: Loots an available corpse if you have authority.

topic.name: /clear
topic.text: Clears the history of the chat window.

topic.name: /advisor
topic.text: <on/off>/<question> Turn advisor mode on/off. Ask an question about the game.

topic.name: /advice
topic.text: <message> Send an message as advice to some one that did "/advisor <question>".

topic.name: /train
topic.text: Start a training session with a trainer target.

topic.name: /quests
topic.text: Display current quest notebook.

topic.name: /use
topic.text: Uses the targeted item.

topic.name: /stopusing
topic.text: Stop using the targeted item.

topic.name: /dig
topic.text: Mine for natural resources in the ground.

topic.name: /target_next_nearest_player
topic.text: Targets the player that is the next nearest to you after your current target. If you do not have a target, it targets the closest player. If there is no next target, it cycles back to the nearest player. Maximum range: 50 meters.

topic.name: /target_prev_nearest_player
topic.text: Targets the player that is the next furthest from you after your current target. If you do not have a target, it targets the furthest player. If there is no next target, it cycles back to the furthest player. Maximum range: 50 meters.

topic.name: /target_next_nearest_npc
topic.text: Targets the NPC that is the next nearest to you after your current target. If you do not have a target, it targets the closest NPC. If there is no next target, it cycles back to the nearest NPC. Maximum range: 50 meters.

topic.name: /target_prev_nearest_npc
topic.text: Targets the NPC that is the next furthest from you after your current target. If you do not have a target, it targets the furthest NPC. If there is no next target, it cycles back to the furthest NPC. Maximum range: 50 meters.

topic.name: /target_clear
topic.text: Clears your target.

topic.name: /tip
topic.text: Requests a tip from the server.

topic.name: /motd
topic.text: Requests the MOTD from the server.

topic.name: /challenge
topic.text: Challenge another player to a duel.

topic.name: /yield
topic.text: Surrender to a dueling player.

topic.name: /petition
topic.text: <pozadavek> Preda GM petici pozadujici nejakou zmenu nebo opravu.

topic.name: /petition_list
topic.text: List all of the petitions you have submitted.

topic.name: /invite
topic.text: <hrac> Pozve zadaneho hrace do skupiny.

topic.name: /disband
topic.text: Rozpusteni skupiny jejim vedoucim.

topic.name: /leavegroup
topic.text: Opusteni skupiny jejimz clenem jsi.

topic.name: /groupmembers
topic.text: Vypise vsechny cleny skupiny jejimz clenem jsi.

topic.name: /guildinfo
topic.text: Opens the guild window.

topic.name: /newguild
topic.text: <nazev> Vytvoreni noveho guildu s danym jmenem a s tvoji postavou jako vedoucim.

topic.name: /endguild
topic.text: Je-li zadan vedoucim guildu, je guild rozpusten.

topic.name: /guildinvite
topic.text: <hrac> Pozve zadaneho hrace aby se stal clenem guildu.

topic.name: /guildremove
topic.text: <hrac> Zrusi clenstvi zadaneho hrace v guildu.

topic.name: /guildlevel
topic.text: <uroven> <nazev> Pojmenuje uroven postaveni v guildu.

topic.name: /guildpromote
topic.text: <hrac> <uroven> Jmenuje zadaneho hrace na zadanou uroven postaveni v guildu.

topic.name: /guildsymbol
topic.text: <symbolname> Sets the guild symbol to the named symbol_czech.

topic.name: /guildmembers
topic.text: <uroven> Vypise cleny guildu, omezene urovni (pokud byla zadana).

topic.name: /guildpoints
topic.text: <guild> Ukaze karmu zadaneho guildu.

topic.name: /guildname
topic.text: <guildname> Changes name of your guild to the new guild name.

topic.name: /guildsecret
topic.text: [on|off] Nastavi utajeni guildu. Pokud bylo zavolano bez argumentu, tak se utajeni pouze ukaze.

topic.name: /guildweb
topic.text: Sets URL of guild web page.

topic.name: /guildmotd
topic.text: Sets/views the guild's MOTD.

topic.name: /guildwar
topic.text: Invites another guild (the target's guild) to start a guild war.

topic.name: /guildyield
topic.text: Surrenders to the target's guild to end a guild war.

topic.name: /newalliance
topic.text: <alliance name> Creates new alliance of guilds.

topic.name: /allianceinvite
topic.text: <leader name> Invites leader of another guild to your guild alliance.

topic.name: /allianceremove
topic.text: <guild name> Removes a guild from your guild alliance.

topic.name: /allianceleave
topic.text: Leave your guild alliance.

topic.name: /allianceleader
topic.text: <guild name> Hands over alliance leadership to another guild.

topic.name: /endalliance
topic.text: Disband your guild alliance.

topic.name: /quit
topic.text: Ukonceni hry.

topic.name: /echo
topic.text: This repeats what you type in the chat window without sending it to anyone else_czech.

topic.name: /confirm
topic.text: Ukaze potvrzovaci dialog s tlacitky Ano/Ne.

topic.name: /ping
topic.text: Shows your average ping to the server.

topic.name: /screenshot
topic.text: Takes a screenshot and saves it in your PlaneShift folder.

topic.name: /spelleffect
topic.text: Tests a particle.

topic.name: /targetinfo
topic.text: Displays more info about the target.

topic.name: /help
topic.text: Displays this window.

topic.name: /petition_manage
topic.text: Manage petitions to help users.

topic.name: /show_gm
topic.text: Displays the GM commands window.

topic.name: /teleport_to
topic.text: <player name> Teleports a GM to the given player.

topic.name: /slide
topic.text: <name>,<direction> Slides the targetted petitioner in the direction specified (L,R,F,B,U,D).

topic.name: /slide_me
topic.text: <L,R,F,B,U,D> Slides self in the direction specified.

topic.name: /mute
topic.text: <player name> Mutes the named player until they log back in to this server.

topic.name: /unmute
topic.text: <player name> Unmutes the named player.

topic.name: /death
topic.text: Finger of Death on target.

topic.name: /kick
topic.text: <jmeno hrace> Vyhodi hrace ze serveru.

topic.name: /npc
topic.text: <master npc name> Vytvori klon daneho NPC na tve soucasne pozici.

topic.name: /killnpc
topic.text: Zabije zamereny NPC.

topic.name: /item
topic.text: <nazev veci> Vytvori novy objekt na tve soucasne pozici.

topic.name: /crystal
topic.text: Vytvori novou polozku v Crystal Hunt databazi na tve soucasne pozici.

topic.name: Usage
topic.text: Click stuff, and stuff will happen. Well it's meant to anyway.... Sometimes.

topic.name: Info
topic.text: Makes the world go round.

topic.name: Vengeance
topic.text: Be afraid, very afraid.

topic.name: PlaneShift
topic.text: What do you think this is called? Idiot.

topic.name: Trepor
topic.text: Size: 3ft Likes: Dwarf flesh. Dislikes: Devs posing as gods.
